member.name: CSV_NAMESPACE_INFO
member.summary: Contains the output for the FSCTL_IS_CSV_FILEcontrol code that retrieves namespace information for a file.

summary.para: The version number. This value must be set to CSV_NAMESPACE_INFO_V1.

member.name: CSV_NAMESPACE_INFO.DeviceNumber
member.summary: The device number of the disk.

member.name: CSV_NAMESPACE_INFO.StartingOffset
member.summary: The starting offset of the volume.

member.name: CSV_NAMESPACE_INFO.SectorSize
member.summary: The sector size of the disk.
